issue.title: Can no longer play back tunnel circuit logs in current docker image

content.raw:
I was able to do it with just `ign gazebo --playback <log_dir>` from inside of a dated Docker image whenever I attempted to playback a log from CloudSim this morning.  I did have issues running it on my native workspace.

A recent update might have impacted log playback, maybe some others can shine light on whether or not they've had issues or if there is a fix.
content.html:
